doc:
Lambert Wilson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lambert_Wilson 0 Lambert Wilson (born 3 August 1958) is a French actor, singer and activist internationally best known for his portrayal of The Merovingian in The Matrix Reloaded and The Matrix Revolutions. Lambert_Wilson ( born 3_August_1958 ) is a_French_actor_,_singer_and_activist internationally_best_known for his_portrayal of The_Merovingian in The_Matrix_Reloaded and The_Matrix_Revolutions .
